CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(CreatedDate), null, TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))) & '-' & LPAD(TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))), 2, '0') & '-' & LPAD(TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))), 2, '0') & 'T' & LPAD(TEXT(HOUR(TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate))), 2, '0') & ':' & LPAD(TEXT(MINUTE(TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate))), 2, '0') & ':' & LPAD(TEXT(SECOND(TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate))), 2, '0') )
CustomField.label: DateTime
